concept.title: Use the newly added JRE in a test project

conbody.p: To run a test project with the new JRE:

li.p: Download jaxb-api-2.3.1.jar library. You can download JAXB API 2.3.1 from the Maven Repository website here: JAXB API 2.3.1.
Add the jaxb-api-2.3.1.jar library to your test project. To do so, you can follow the instructions in this document: Add an external library to a project.

ul.li: The JRE version used to run test projects and JRE compiler compliance level should be compatible. For instance, Java 8 test projects are compatible with the default JRE compiler level 1.8. To alter JRE compiler compliance level, go to Preferences > Java > Compiler.
In case you want to check which Java version the test project is developed with, add the following script to a test case, then run it and see the log.
